ygData.subject: Re: an Idea
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Happens to me all the time.  I cast Illusion:(whatever) to get better prices in the city I m in at the time. Eventually, someone walks up to me and asks
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Jan 17, 2000 at 01:14:32PM -0800, Quasinom de Plume wrote:
> From: =?iso-8859-1?q?Quasinom=20de=20Plume?= <eqmailing@...>
>
> I have seen this bug in relation to Ogres and Trolls but I have yet to see
> this same effect occur with Gnomish Enchanters or other smaller races
> using a guise of the deceiver. That's not to say it's possible - just
> that I haven't seen it.

Happens to me all the time. I cast Illusion:(whatever) to get better prices
in the city I'm in at the time.

Eventually, someone walks up to me and asks why I'm so small.

Joe D
